banned_groceries.Location: Banned in the UK, parts of Europe and Japan
banned_groceries.reason: contain a chemical called BHT, which is short for butylated hydroxytoluene. There is some evidence that the chemical may be a carcinogen.

banned_groceries.Location: Banned in Australia, Switzerland, Hungary, Iceland, Norway and Denmark
banned_groceries.reason: contain hydrogenated cottonseed oil, which raise your risk for cardiovascular disease and diabetes
